WorkflowInfo.Name: Compare DLL versions
WorkflowInfo.Description: Compare DLL files versions and create a report.
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process checks if the versions of two files are identical on a list of servers, and sends a report. It can be useful to issue a report of all servers with DLL files which are not updated.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:FileVersion;Assembly=FileVersion, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FileVersion IsValid="True" x:Name="OriginalDLLFile" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get File Version" Path="C:\Windows\system\avicap.dll" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets the file version." HostId="1" TypeName="FileVersion" UserName="" /><ns1:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ServerName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Dll_x0020_Version" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server1</ServerName>
 <Dll_x0020_Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server2</ServerName>
 <Dll_x0020_Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server3</ServerName>
 <Dll_x0020_Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>192.168.1.1</ServerName>
 <Dll_x0020_Version />
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /><ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%ServersList%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"><ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="ServersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns0:FileVersion IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerFile" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get File Version" Path="C:\Windows\system\avicap.dll" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets the file version." HostId="-2" TypeName="FileVersion" UserName="" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns7:ReturnValue Value="%OriginalDLLFile%" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals("&&&","%OriginalDLLFile%")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns8:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="Updated" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" VariableName="%ServersList%" x:Name="setUpdated" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns7:ReturnValue Value="%OriginalDLLFile%" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Equals("&&&","%OriginalDLLFile%")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns8:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="Not Updated - %ServerFile%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" VariableName="%ServersList%" x:Name="setNotUpdated" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%ServersList%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /><ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="DLL Versions report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE>%convertToHTMLTable1%</PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
